channel.title: beauty on Uncombed Whiskers
channel.description: Recent content in beauty on Uncombed Whiskers

item.title: Quirky Container Names
item.description: If you work with docker containers, you would have noticed the quirky names that docker generates for your containers. Ever wondered how they are generated? Let me unravel this mystery for you today.

item.title: Pearls from the deep end =~ s/[a,s]//g
item.description: Reprinted from a veritable Perl/Tcl vs Scheme flame war of yore; of course without permission
